On the basis of latest reports and national recognitions achieved by
these programs, the return received on these relatively small sums would
appear to have justified them® It also has made possible several joint radio-
TV efforts and uses. Since the NAEB believes in the eventual integrated uses
of all electronic media for education, it is particularly interested in keeping
both radio and television in a position to share the electronic educational
load, which we believe the future holds in store, and which will require all
the facilities and trained uses in both media which our nation can provide •
